parameters.description: sort repos by attribute. Supported values are "alpha", "created", "updated", "size", and "id". Default is "alpha"

FounderActivity.description: FounderActivity represents the activity of a founder

GPGKeyEmail.description: GPGKeyEmail an email attached to a GPGKey

InviteSolverOption.description: InviteSolverOption options to invite a solver to a bounty

InviteeActivity.description: InviteeActivity represents the activity of a invitee

Issue.description: Issue represents an issue in a repository

state.description: Whether the issue is open or closed

IssueSolutionProgress.description: IssueSolutionProgress represents the progress of a user in solving an issue

JobCandidate.description: JobCandidate represents a candidate for a job posting

Label.description: Label a label to an issue or a pr

LinkAccountOption.description: LinkAccountOption options when linking a bank account

Text.description:
Text markdown to render

in: body

Wiki.description:
Is it a wiki page ?

in: body

Milestone.description: Milestone milestone is a collection of issues on one repository

OnboardingProgress.description: OnboardingProgress represents the onboarding progress of a user

PayloadCommitVerification.description: PayloadCommitVerification represents the GPG verification of a commit

PayloadUser.description: PayloadUser represents the author or committer of a commit

name.description: Full name of the commit author

Payment.description: Payment represents a bounty payment made by a user

PaymentAmount.description:
PaymentAmount is a positive integer representing how much to charge in the
smallest currency unit (e.g., 100 cents to charge $1.00 or 100 to charge
100, a zero-decimal currency)

PaymentDetails.description: PaymentDetails represents payment details of a bounty

Permission.description: Permission represents a set of permissions

PreUserStartup.description: PreUserStartup represents a startup who has requested access on Algora

PreUserStudent.description: PreUserStudent represents a student who has requested access on Algora

estimated_time.description: Estimated number of months needed to complete the sprint

PublicKey.description: PublicKey publickey is a user key to push code to repository

PullRequestMeta.description: PullRequestMeta PR info if an issue is a PR

Reaction.description: Reaction represents a reaction on issues, comments and messages

RegToken.title: RegToken represents a Firebase Cloud Messaging device registration token.

SearchResults.description: SearchResults results of a successful search

SendJobDigestEmailOption.description: SendJobDigestEmailOption options for sending a job digest email

ServerVersion.description: ServerVersion wraps the version of the server

SolutionProgress.description: SolutionProgress represents the progress of solving a bounty

SolverActivity.description: SolverActivity represents the activity of a solver

Status.description: Status holds a single Status of a single Commit

StatusState.description:
StatusState holds the state of a Status
It can be "pending", "success", "error", "failure", and "warning"

Stopwatch.title: Stopwatch represents a stopwatch for time tracking.

Team.description: Team represents a team in an organization

TrackedTime.description: TrackedTime worked time for an issue / pr

UpdateProgressOption.description: UpdateProgressOption options to update bounty solution progress

is_organization.description: whether or not user is an organization

UserHeatmapData.description: UserHeatmapData represents the contributions of a user in a given time

UserStats.description: UserStats is a collection of user statistics

num_accessible_repos.description: Number of repositories that the user has explicit permission (:read, :write, or :admin) to access.

num_earned_bounties.description: Number of bounties that the user has earned

num_funded_bounties.description: Number of bounties that the user has directly or indirectly funded

total_bounty_earnings.description: Total amount that the user has earned through bounties

total_bounty_fundings.description: Total amount that the user has directly or indirectly funded through bounties

WatchInfo.description: WatchInfo represents an API watch status of one repository

AccessToken.description: AccessToken represents a API access token.

AccessTokenList.description: AccessTokenList represents a list of API access token.

MarkdownRender.description: MarkdownRender is a rendered markdown document

forbidden.description: APIForbiddenError is a forbidden error response

notFound.description: APINotFound is a not found empty response

validationError.description: APIValidationError is error format response related to input validation
